name: War.io
description:
This is battle simulator , where you can play single player or in sandbox.

Unlock over 20 units while you progress in this fun game.  There are 20 levels which are harder and harder as you move from level 1.

After you created your army select ready and the fight will begin.

FEATURES :
Beautiful graphics
Over 20 levels
Over 20 units
Progress
Unlock new levels
